messages.title: MORE THAN A POLITICIAN
messages.content: John McNally isn't your usual idea of a politician, John McNally is already a Local Champion.

leaflet.personalStatement: For most of his adult life John has worked on a voluntary basis in his own community: A community football coach working with dozens of local children teaching them the value of teamwork and positive living. Promoting local history and heritage as a member of the local Heritage Society. Working for the environment as a member of the Community Green Initiative. A member and supporter of local Bowling Clubs.

politicalExperience.achievements: The popular Denny barber became the first SNP Councillor in Denny when he won the 2005 Falkirk Council by-election with a staggering 24% swing from Labour to the SNP and topped the poll again in 2007 in the extended Denny & Banknock multi member ward.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet published by Cllr Cecil Meiklejohn on behalf of John McNally.
